sentence.idiomatic: The number you have dialed cannot be connected at the moment. Please try again in a moment.
I'm in the middle of dealing with it, please wait a moment.
The system is busy, please try again in a moment.
It's free to answer all calls on my cell phone.
I've called quite a few times, no one ever answers.
He is in a meeting, it's not convenient for him to answer the phone.
Don't give him a hint yet, let him think about it himself.
Do you know how to change the text message alert tone?
I've already given you a lot of hints, how come you still can't guess it?
Hurry, reply as soon as possible.
Don't worry, I will solve that problem as quickly as possible.
It is not very safe here, I want to move as soon as I can.
These past few days I haven't been able to reach him. I wonder if something happened to him?

word.literal: to shift to an earlier date

sentence.idiomatic: Those friends who are interested in going hiking on the weekend, please contact me in advance.
I have already contacted that company.
Hello, thank you for calling our company. Please enter an extension number, or press zero to speak with the operator.
(sound of dialing numbers)
(busy signal) I'm sorry, this extension is busy. Please call again later. Please dial an extension number, or press zero to speak with the operator.
(sound of dialing numbers)
(dead air) I'm sorry, there is no answer. Please leave a message after the tone, or call again later.
Whats up with that? I'll call the mobile number. (sound of dialing numbers)
(phone ringing--Chinese pop songs) Hello, I can't come to the phone right now. Please leave a message after the tone, I will get back to you as soon as possible.
Screw you.
